name: Boxing Apocalypse
detailed_description:
Online Multiplayer Available Now!

Choose your armor, pick your weapon, and fight it out in our new online PvP combat system. Battle against players online in an alien boxing match for the ages, fight to be the boss. Battle against your friends, challenge the world, you are destined to rule!


About the Game

You are one of the world’s most deadly assassins, you are captured and locked up on a floating prison in outer space to rot away. The prison is overrun by aliens, and the only way to survive is to battle other assassins in the pit. The aliens perform body altering tests on you, and you begin your training as they prepare for an upcoming interplanetary invasion. The only way to stop the war is to fight through the hordes of aliens on the mothership and defeat the boss to wear the crown and rule the ship and other prisoners. Boxing Apocalypse is a player vs. player combat game that features a fully immersive, intuitive, combat system complete with finishing Power Punches, specialty skill combinations, multiple weapons, and levels of difficulty ranging from easy to insane to challenge players on all skill levels. You are equipped with an energy shield to provide a fun counter block experience with your punches. You must battle through the hordes of aliens and defeat the boss in campaign mode or go to the pit to battle other VR players and see who holds the highest ranking within the prison walls and gets to survive another day. As your game begins, you can look around your prison cell, you look down to see you are wearing body armor, look up to see the brim of your helmet, your ready for battle. Suddenly you look down again, and see the Aliens have removed your arms, replacing them with alien tech; spinning balls of mercury that transform into weapons and objects you can use for battle. Your gauntlets show your score, health and power punches as you play. Increase your skill level with special combinations, execute finishing move Power Punches... use your integrated Armored shield for accurate Blocks/ Punch Combinations.. Different level settings from Easy to Extreme allows all users from beginner to advanced highly skilled VR warriors. Game Creator / Designer Mario Simone

combinations, multiple weapons, and levels of difficulty ranging from easy to insane to challenge players on all skill levels. You are equipped with an energy shield to provide a fun counter block experience with your punches.

Game Creator / Designer Mario Simone
short_description: You are the world’s best assassin, locked up on a space prison taken over by aliens beginning human testing, and waging war on mankind. For sport,  aliens watch inmates battle to the death. Players must use their boxing skills to fight for freedom, the winner stays alive to see another day.
reviews:
“Fight your way to Freedom in Boxing Apiocalypse”
VR TheGamers

“Take on an Alien Invasion with your Fists!”
VR Focus

“Step up to an alien and punch it right in the mug with your specialized boxing gloves”
VR Fitness Insider

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia GTX 1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

legal_notice: Gotham City Films, LLC - all rights reserved
